interactivity.requirements: 20 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " First Words " from Ayane Amamiya

progression.synopsis: Sensei and Ayane are resting after sparring with their instructor at the dojo. Ayane tries to continue their karate roleplay , but Sensei would prefer to just rest. Ayane insists on holding on to Sensei no matter who might be watching, admitting that she has been "feeling a little down lately". She doesn't want to talk about why.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.6.
